meanings.definition: A set of rooms designated for a specific purpose or use.
meanings.sent1: The hotel offers luxurious suites for guests to stay in.
meanings.sent2: The resort has suites overlooking the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The suites in the castle were so grand that they made the visitors feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: The suites of the mansion whispered stories of the past to those who entered.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the suites felt like stepping into a different world altogether.

meanings.definition: A set of matching furniture or accessories.
meanings.sent1: The living room had a beautiful set of suites that matched perfectly.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new bedroom suite that included a bed, dresser, and nightstand.
meanings.sent3: The suites of cushions and curtains in the room created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The dining room suite gleamed with polished wood and elegant design.
meanings.sent5: The suites of furniture in the showroom displayed a harmonious blend of colors and styles.

meanings.definition: A set of related software applications.
meanings.sent1: The software company released a new suites package for businesses.
meanings.sent2: The graphic design suite included programs for editing images and creating illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The suites of programs worked seamlessly together to enhance productivity.
meanings.sent4: Her favorite software suite made editing photos a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The suites of applications offered a complete solution for all her digital needs.
